Room.Name: Reflecting Pool
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the edge of a quiet pool, so still it reflects like a mirror.
Room.LongDescription: As you gaze into the pool, it's difficult to avoid becoming totally disoriented, as up appears to be down and down looks up. There are wild flowers everywhere, creating a blanket of vivid colors to the water's edge. Saplings and older trees stand back, making the pond a world to itself in this tiny meadow.
